title: Strawberry GraphQL types for Project
description: Implement `app/graphql/types/project.py` with ProjectType and CollaboratorType. ProjectType fields: id, title, description, status, role, thumbnail_url, links, tech_stack, impact_metrics, github_repo_full_name, github_stars, created_at, updated_at. Lazy fields: owner → UserType, collaborators → list[CollaboratorType]. CollaboratorType fields: user → UserType, role, status, invited_at, confirmed_at.
acceptance_criteria:
- ProjectType with all fields
- CollaboratorType with all fields
- Lazy resolvers for owner and collaborators
- Types reference UserType correctly
- JSON fields (links, tech_stack, impact_metrics) mapped correctly
